metadata.synopsis: AD for a memory imprint on an empty pod in the Tadpoling Centre.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Tadpoling Centre (ReCon command "oe tc_teleport")- Interact with S_COL_TadpolingCentre_MemoryImprint_004_e49beb7e-4a8c-4889-99f5-d09091b38860

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The device does not react to your presence.*
